item.description: Embarassing moments saying no versus saying yes “Most of the embarrassing moments of my life happened when I wanted to say no, but ended up saying yes (or saying nothing at all).
Do you want to talk about it or be distracted from it? One of [[My Favorite Phrases]] when someone is feeling down.

item.description: Start with the Bad, End with the Good Instead of “Thank you for the offer, but I’m busy”, say “I’m busy, but thank you for the offer.
